title: The top-cited research works in the Science Citation Index E
author: Yuh-Shan Ho
description: This study aimed to identify and analyze the characteristics of the top-cited articles published in the Science Citation Index Expanded from 1991 to 2010. Articles that have been cited more than 1,00
cleaned_text: top-cited research works in the Science Citation Index Expanded Download full text from publisher As the access to this document is restricted, you may want to [search](/cgi-bin/htsearch?q=%22The+top+cited+research+works+in+the+Science+Citation+Index+Expanded%22) for a different version of it.
